sourcesContent:
Pending Application Requests

Name OfficialMail Phone Number Designation Role EmployeeId Aadhar Number Company Action
{{request.username}} {{request.officialmail}} {{request.phonenumber}} {{request.username}} {{request.designation}} Motorist Rider {{request.enployeeId}} {{request.aadharnumber}} {{request.company}} View
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import{ ApplicationRequest } from '../models/model.applicationrequest'; import { ApiService } from '../api.service'; import { ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { HttpClient, HttpErrorResponse, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-application-request', templateUrl: './application-request.component.html', styleUrls: ['./application-request.component.scss'] }) export class ApplicationRequestComponent implements OnInit{ applicationRequests:ApplicationRequest[]; constructor(private router: Router, private apiService: ApiService){} ngOnInit(): void { } getPendingApplicationRequest(){ this.apiService.getPendingApplications().subscribe( requests =>{ this.applicationRequests=requests; }, error => console.log(error) ); } navigatetoapplicationrequest(id: number){ this.router.navigate(['application-request',id]); } }
